summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Higher or Lower game completed successfully. All 5 categories, game mechanics, animations, responsive design, and sharing features are working perfectly.
passed_tests: Homepage loads with all 5 category cards (population, box-office, nba-salary, animals, gdp)
Category card navigation to game pages works correctly
Game page shows Card A with visible value and Card B with hidden ??? value
Higher and Lower buttons are clickable and functional
Game mechanics work: correct guesses show confetti animation and increment score
Wrong guesses trigger game over screen with final score and tier labels
Game over screen displays all elements: final score, best score, closest call, tier label
Share buttons work: Copy Link (shows 'COPIED!' after click), Twitter/X, WhatsApp
Play Again button successfully restarts the game
Categories button navigates back to home page
Hard Mode toggle functions correctly in header
Score and Best score are displayed in header during gameplay
Back arrow navigates from game page to home
VS badge is displayed between cards
All 5 category game URLs work: /higher-or-lower/population, /higher-or-lower/box-office, etc.
Mobile responsive layout: cards stack vertically on mobile (390x844 viewport)
Desktop layout: cards display side by side (1920x1080 viewport)
Reveal animations work with CountUp number animations
FAQ section appears after game over with category-specific content
Local storage functionality for best scores
Keyboard accessibility and tab navigation
SEO page titles update correctly for each category
Direct URL access works for all categories
